channel.title: Mozilla on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mozilla on Joone Blog

item.title: Working on the Servo project
item.description: I began to work on the Servo project. Actually, my first open source project was Mozilla and also I was involved in the Korea Mozilla community.

item.title: Debugging Fennec front-end
item.description: Fennec is a XUL application, like Firefox based on Mozilla Platform.

item.title: Fennec is running on SAMSUNG i780
item.description: I was told a very good news from Blassey blog.

item.title: Firefox Seoul Party for celebrating the release of Firefox3
item.description: Mitchell Baker, chair of the Mozilla foundation and Gen Kanai, Asia marketing manager, visited Korea to attend the OECD ministerial meeting during June 17th ~ 18th and give talks in the Future of Global Web Technology conference on June 19th.

item.title: Latest looks of Fennec (Mobile Firefox)
item.description: The plan of Mobile Firefox was announced in October last

item.title: Open Source in Asia
item.description: I’d like to introduce a presentation about open source in Asia.

item.title: libpng patch for Mobile Firefox
item.description: There are submitted patches for Mobile Firefox on the Mozilla wiki.

item.title: Korea Mozilla Community Party
item.description: I attended the Korea Mozilla Community Annual Party 2007 last week which was hosted by Channy.

item.title: Introduction to Mozilla based web browsers
item.description: We are using Firefox browser that has been developed by Mozilla.
